findings.code: (reify HostnameVerifier (verify [_ url-hostname session] (when-not (.equalsIgnoreCase url-hostname (.getPeerHost session)) (vis/warn :log :host-of-different-session :host url-hostname :session (.getPeerHost session) :message "Warning: URL host is different to SSLSession host.")) true))

name: Improper Certificate Validation
message: Insecure HostnameVerifier implementation detected. This will accept any SSL certificate with any hostname, which creates the possibility for man-in-the-middle attacks.
